description:
ResourceAction represents an individual action that can be performed on a resource.
It includes parameters, an optional disabled flag, an icon for display, and a name for the action.

disabled.description: Disabled indicates whether the action is disabled.

displayName.description: DisplayName provides a user-friendly name for the action.

iconClass.description: IconClass specifies the CSS class for the action's icon.

name.description: Name is the name or identifier for the action.

params.description: Params contains the parameters required to execute the action.
